Walk :- 

-> A walk is defined as a
 finite alternating
 sequence of vertices and
 edge beginning and
 ending with vertex.

-> No edge appears more
 than once in walk, A
 vertex , however , may
 appear more than once.

-> The length of the walk
 is the number of edge in
 it A walk is closed if the
 first vertex and last
 vertex and last vertex are
 same in this graph.

Path :- 

-> An open walk in which no
 vertex appears more than
 once is called path.

-> The number of edge in
 path is called length of
 path we can be include
 self loop in walk but not
 in path.

Circuit :- 

-> A closed walk in which
 no vertex [except initial
 and final vertex] appears
 more than once is called
 circuit.
